task.title: Creating a Termed Subscription Plan
task.shortdesc: Termed Subscription Plans exist for a set period of months. Termed subscriptions start at the time of purchase and continue through the defined term of the subscription. This is also commonly referred to as an "Anniversary" membership.

step.cmd: Navigate to Subscription Plans in the eStore app and click New.
Enter a Name for the Subscription Plan, set the Type to Termed, and check the Is Active checkbox.
Set the number of months for the Initial Term and Renewal Term.
step.info: If no value is specified, the Renewal Term defaults to the number of months set for the Initial Term.
Optionally, select the Auto Renew Option:

choices.choice: Disabled-Turns off Auto Renew for all related subscriptions in the Community Portal.
Enabled-Allows subscription beneficiaries to turn on Auto Renew for related subscriptions in the Community Portal.
Required-Enables Auto Renew without option. If selected, then the Require Payment Method checkbox must be checked.

step.info: If the Auto Renew Option is set to Enabled or Required, enter the number of days prior to the subscription's expiration date that customers are invoiced, into the Invoice Days Variable field. The Invoice Days Variable field and the Days to Lapse field must have the same value; value must be greater than 0.

info.b: In order to communicate an invoice is created to the customer, build a custom workflow.

step.cmd: Add a Description and click Save.

taskbody.result: A Termed Subscription Plan is created.
